attributes.action: Ask the government to allow a referendum on UK lockdowns
attributes.additional_details: I dont believe that lockdowns do any good whatsoever. They exacerbate the economic, physical and mental hardships that people have to put up with. Lockdowns do not do anything but suppress the virus for the period of the lockdown, once the lockdown is over the virus will increase again, thus making the lockdown a pointless exercise.
attributes.background: I would like the government to allow the people of the UK to have a say or a referendum on whether or not they support local, regional or UK lockdowns

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551539
